verses.1: A si sa thote in paknamtui bung sungah a om paknamtui uihsak thei a, hai tatna themno khat in pilna lian pen susia thei hi.
verses.2: Mipilte a manin a gamtat ding a ngeina hi a, mihaite a sia-in a gamtat ding a ngeina ahi hi.
verses.3: Mihaite lampi ah a paikawm nangawnin hai tat uh a, a haina uh mi khempeuh theisak uh hi.
verses.4: Nang tungah gam ukpa a heh leh na nasep za taisan pah kei in. Dai tak a om hithiatna in khialhna lianpi maisak thei hi.
verses.5: Hih leitungah a thuman lo gam ukteʼ piansak ka muhte:
verses.6: Mihaite, zalianpi kipia a, mihaute kiniamkoih suk hi.
verses.7: Sakol tungah silate tuang a, mi liante, sila bangin a khe-un pai uh hi.
verses.8: Gum a tote gum sung mahah kia dinga, miʼ phung a phelsakte gul in tu ding hi.
verses.9: Suang a to khiate suang mah in liamsak dinga, sing a ekte sing ehna mahah liam ding hi.
verses.10: I hei mawl napi-in i tat kei leh nakpi takin sat kul a, ngaihsut masak ding pilhuai zaw hi.
verses.11: Gul khim thei napi i khim kei leh a kimanna om tuan lo hi; gul in hong tu veve ding hi.
verses.12: Mipilteʼ kampauna in pahtawina ngahsak a, mihaiteʼ kampauna in amau mah siasak hi.
verses.13: Thugen a kipat ciangun bangtum loteng tawh kipan pah malam uh a, gitloh vai teng tawh a thugen a khum lel uh hi.
verses.14: Mihaite in thu gengenin ciakciak uh hi. Mailam a thupiang ding kuamah in thei lo a, a sih khit-a thupiang ding a hong gen thei om lo hi.
verses.15: A inn zuat nading lampi a thei lo mihai luate bek, a inn lam zonna-in gim ding uh hi.
verses.16: A kumpipa miʼ cih bangbangin gamta lel a, zan khuavak-in zune makai a a nei, gam khat peuhpeuh in lungkhamna thuak hi.
verses.17: A kumpipa in lungsim khensatna nei thei a, a makaite in an nek tui dawn a hun thei a, amau ki-uk thei-in zu a kham lo makai a nei, gam khat peuhpeuh a hampha gam ahi hi.
verses.18: Thadah lua-in a inn vang nangawn a hu nuam lo mipa, a inn keh dinga, a inn nangawn in puk lawh ding hi.
verses.19: An in lungdamsak a, zu in lung nuamsak hi. Sum in ahihleh na khempeuh a kicingsak hi.
verses.20: Na lungsim nangawn ah kumpipa gensia kei in. Kuama zak lohna mun na lupna tung nangawn ah mihaute samsia kei in. Thopi in na thugen teng na puak kha ding hi.
